verbose_text: Per1 and Per2 expression are further modulated by the basic helix-loop-helix factors DEC1 and DEC2, and by the basic leucine zipper transcription factor E4BP4 and its counterbalance transcription factor DBP [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: modulated by the basic helix-loop-helix factors DEC1 and DEC2, and by the basic leucine zipper transcription factor E4BP4 and its counterbalance transcription
